text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump No, no you didn't, Trump and admin have disgraced a sacred site. Gratuitous flyovers on Air Force One, exposing thousands to death by Covid-19, racist speeches, risked setting fire to the place, all for showmanship of reelection. Disgrace comes from the WH. 
#Covid19
